column4: hmm this is weird. on www.spele.nl there's a bunch of flash games. I just went there on a newly installed Ubuntu 7.10 and the games don't work, says I need to install the flash plugin. So it finds the plugin and flashplugin-nonfree gets automatically installed.
however, it still doesn't work, but it does work on another computer
dammit, I try to ask only the real trivial desktoppy questions in here and it's STILL hard to get any answer.
Flash problems are not trivial and attitude accounts for alot.. as well as patience
